Subskills.name: Intensified Snowfall
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by blizzard.

Subskills.name: Snowstorm Maelstrom
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of blizzard inflicting frostbite and a strong slow on hit.

Subskills.name: Frost Domain
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of blizzard.

Subskills.name: Crackling Ice
Subskills.description: Chance to stun targets on hit dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Tracking Snowinds
Subskills.description: Blizzard slowly moves towards the nearest monster.

Subskills.name: Corrosive Ice
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict frostbite on hit.

Subskills.name: Hypothermic Temperature
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict cold break on hit.

Subskills.name: Snowmageddon
Subskills.description: Blizzard gains increased size and projectile frequency over time dropping a huge boulder when expiring..

Subskills.name: Winter Echoes
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to summon an additional blizzard.

Subskills.name: Cold Necrosis
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to frostbitten targets.

Subskills.name: Chilling Coldsnap
Subskills.description: Monsters killed by blizzard explode into icicles dealing additional damage to nearby monsters.

Subskills.name: Frost Flurries
Subskills.description: Ice chunks explode into frozen novas when hitting the ground dealing area of effect damage.

Subskills.name: Frigid Eruption
Subskills.description: Unleash a shockwave of blizzards towards target location. Blizzard no longer has a cooldown.
